item.title: LLMOps - The Emerging Toolkit for Reliable, High-quality LLM Applications
item.description: Many operational challenges Cost Privacy Performance Need for frequent updates (knowledge is limited) How can we make LLM apps reliable MLOps tools for gen AI: LLMOps in mlflow New programming models: Stanford DSP Start with Basics Need ways to

item.title: Building LLM Apps for Production
item.description: Following are the challenges faced while building LLM apps for production Challenge 1: Consistency How to ensure user consistency? How to ensure downstream apps can run without breaking?
